name: Heart Cleaner Robot
description:
[Description]

Control a cleaner robot in it's first day work in the important job of cleaning broken hearts of those who had a bad romance.

[Controls]

A W S D - Movement

R - Return to last checkpoint

Made in three days for #BrackeysGameJam2

Fonts and Unity Processing Stack used under free commercial usage.
Please give some feedback. Thank you for playing.
